newsitem.title: USA: Times Mirror plans sale of art book unit.
newsitem.headline: Times Mirror plans sale of art book unit.

text.p: Times Mirror Co said Wednesday it plans to sell unit Harry N. Abrams Inc, a publisher of of art and illustrated books that employs about 150 people and is headquartered in New York.
Times Mirror said the unit no longer fit with its focus on newspapers, professional information and magazine publishing.

"We have concluded that Abrams would benefit from an association with a more compatible parent company," said Mark Willes, chief executive. "We will now seek a more appropriate home for Abrams in which it can grow and prosper in the future."
